title: Retro/vintage TV script font - various suggestions {Rainer}
content:
Hi there,

Looking for something similar to this retro/vintage script font (used on an 80s portuguese tv show).  
The letters aren't even the same so this is probably all handwritten - but I'm desperately looking for something like this.

The words are cut - it read 'ora' and 'olha' (the complete words would be 'agora escolha').

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2010-02-19 at 01.15.18.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015100744/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-02-19%20at%2001.15.18.png) | 154.93 KB |
author: diniscorreia

comments.content:
Hard to say which scripts you prefer.  
Have a look at fonts similar to [Monoline Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015100744/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/monoline-script-mt/morelikethis.html).

I see some stylistic characteristics in these for example:  
Susa  
Handsome  
Mullen Hand  
Coffee Service  
Matinee Idol  
and more …
